name: Silk Board Simulator
description:
This is the best Bangalore traffic jam simulator we could come up with in 48 hours. Experience the thrills and chills of moving ten inches an hour as your life crumbles around you.

Credits

  • Art by Raisa Elizabeth Bastian A.K.
  • Writing by Anand Ramachandran
  • Audio by Dipto Chakrabarti
  • Unity stuff by Projjal Chakrabarti
